title: Instruments search
simpleInstrumentSearchInstruction: Like in a 'Instrument select' widget, start type text for instrument search. Click on the desired instrument in dropdown.
syntheticInstrumentSearchInstruction: To create synthetic instrument, click on the desired mathematical sign after instrument selected, and then start to type text for next instrument search.
additionalInfo: Like in mathematical expression you can also add numbers, brackets etc. in your expression.
